directions: In a medium skillet coated with olive oil, saute al fresco chicken sausage, onions, peppers, and garlic.
Add remaining ingredients and stir well.
Cook on low 20 minutes. Serve with a dollop of sour cream (optional).
ingredients: 2 (12 ounce) packages al fresco® Spicy Jalapeno Chicken Sausage
title: Texas Style Chili with Spicy Jalapeno Chicken Sausage
